name: LabyRunth
description:
The goal is to make it to the finish line in the least amount of tries possible.

This game is still a work in progress, but is fully playable.
There are no maps included in the game yet, but I will be adding default ones soon. In the meantime, you can make and play your own, or play your friends maps.

Temporary HTML5 version of the game is out, working on improving it.

Controls:
  • In-game:
    • WASD - Move
    • Escape - Pause
    • You can also press enter to quickly restart.
  • Map Maker:
    • Move your mouse to the right side of the screen to make the map maker menu
    • pop up.
    • To disable/enable the map maker menu press F1.
    • Escape will let you go back to main menu.
